en: A potential client e-mails you about a quick job that should only take you an evening to finish. There's a caveat, though: They want to pay you in exposure.
You finish up the work and send it to the client - only for your name to be buried deep within their website, on a credits page no one will ever read. Oh, well.
You ignore the e-mail. Your time is worth money, and knowing this gives your self-esteem a boost.
